message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation will hit you harder. Let's end this quickly.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats away even more of our potential gains.
Let's just split it down the middle and be done with this. Inflation is hurting us both, and a 50/50 split is the fairest option at this point.
